attributes.action: I challenge this Government on the peoples of this countrys Human Rights to hold a vote on The EU
attributes.additional_details: I would like to challenge this Governments right to deny under the Human Rights Act the peoples of this country a vote on the EU, we have been let down by every main party who think we do not have a right to decide our own future. Its time as  British Citizens that we, the so called Mother  nation of Democracy is denying its own people of their basic rights
